##using a Shell Script

’'’sh function new_post(){ cd _posts SLUGIFIED=”$(echo -n “$1” | sed -e ‘s/[^[:alnum:]]/-/g’ | tr -s ‘-‘ | tr A-Z a-z)” SLUG=$(date + “%Y-%m-%d”-$SLUGIFIED.md) echo -e “—\nlayout: post\ntitle: ‘$1’\nfeatured_image: ‘‘\ncomments: false\ntags: \nsummary:” ‘Summary Here’ \n—\n\n## Be Brilliant” > $SLUG echo $SLUG cd ../ jekyll serve -w }

’’’
